Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.o3J79hnr00ztcwtT]{Fulminating Shot}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire. If you hit with your next attack roll using a firearm or crossbow before the end of your turn, you deal 1d6 additional damage of this type. At 12th level, this increases to 2d6 additional damage, and at 18th level, it increases to 3d6 additional damage.

Effect: Furnace Form.name: Effect: Furnace Form
Effect: Furnace Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6vHkvQv0j56nZuR3]{Furnace Form}

You become living flame, giving you fire immunity, resistance 10 to precision damage, and weakness 5 to cold and to water. Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses). Your fire Elemental Blasts deal an additional die of damage. In fire form, you have a fly Speed of 40 feet.

Effect: Gathering Moss.name: Effect: Gathering Moss
Effect: Gathering Moss.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yg02rHaDPpGSgkrk]{Gathering Moss}

You gain fast healing equal to your level.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic.name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic
Effect: Genie Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tYOMBiH3HbViNWwn]{Bloodline: Genie}

Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round, or a target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Ghost Strike.name: Effect: Ghost Strike
Effect: Ghost Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pM0g4ColXTiQ3gTa]{Ghost Strike}

The weapon gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune. At 10th level, you can apply this effect to two weapons instead of one.

Effect: Ghost Wrangler.name: Effect: Ghost Wrangler
Effect: Ghost Wrangler.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.00OnDt8UEMwfoYWH]{Ghost Wrangler}

Your fists gain the effects of the ghost touch property rune.

Effect: Ghosts in the Storm.name: Effect: Ghosts in the Storm
Effect: Ghosts in the Storm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.sPIaly8bgNxgcNvT]{Stance: Ghosts in the Storm}

The creature gains a +2 status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.

Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Move).name: Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Move)
Effect: Ghosts in the Storm (Move).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ABL4daQ7c65d0tEM]{Ghosts in the Storm}

The creature is concealed, and its Strikes gain the shock rune.

Effect: Giant's Lunge.name: Effect: Giant's Lunge
Effect: Giant's Lunge.description: Until your rage ends, all your melee weapons and unarmed attacks gain reach 10.

Effect: Giant's Stature.name: Effect: Giant's Stature
Effect: Giant's Stature.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.W21jKAcG0GtEtBiK]{Giant's Stature}

You become Large, increasing your reach by 5 feet and gaining the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} condition until you stop raging

Effect: Glimpses to Beyond.name: Effect: Glimpses to Beyond
Effect: Glimpses to Beyond.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.8CZwqRQ1w8OaAtO7]{(Affinity Ablaze) Biting Roses: Glimpses to Beyond}

You gain spiritsense as a precise sense with a range of 60 feet.

Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).name: Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success)
Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Effect: Goblin Song (Success).name: Effect: Goblin Song (Success)
Effect: Goblin Song (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Effect: Great Tengu Form.name: Effect: Great Tengu Form
Effect: Great Tengu Form.description:
Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}.

This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.

Effect: Guardian's Deflection.name: Effect: Guardian's Deflection
Effect: Guardian's Deflection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JdCRxwgtdQkJ1Ha6]{Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YJIzE2RhGRGfbt9j]{Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Guardian's Embrace.name: Effect: Guardian's Embrace
Effect: Guardian's Embrace.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to AC against physical attacks and can use a reaction to gain resistance 10 to physical damage dealt by that attack, which ends this effect.

Effect: Guided Skill.name: Effect: Guided Skill
Effect: Guided Skill.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to checks made using Acrobatics, Occultism, Stealth, or Survival.

Effect: Guided by the Stars.name: Effect: Guided by the Stars
Effect: Guided by the Stars.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s1swBWSqtfrXTJHK]{Guided by the Stars}

You roll twice and take the better result on your next skill check or saving throw. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Effect: Hag Blood Magic.name: Effect: Hag Blood Magic
Effect: Hag Blood Magic.description: Spiteful curses punish your foes. The first creature that deals damage to you before the end of your next turn takes 2 mental damage per spell rank and must attempt a basic Will save.

Effect: Hamstringing Strike.name: Effect: Hamstringing Strike
Effect: Hamstringing Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s2GbcUIXG1ZBurSd]{Hamstringing Strike}

If you hit your prey, the creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to Speed. If you critically hit your prey, the creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speed.

Effect: Harden Flesh.name: Effect: Harden Flesh
Effect: Harden Flesh.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.REgTwIVgI3j1FQiJ]{Harden Flesh}

You gain resistance 3 to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Harrow the Fiend.name: Effect: Harrow the Fiend
Effect: Harrow the Fiend.description: You gain a +1 status bonus on all Strikes or spell attack rolls against fiends.

Effect: Harrow-Chosen.name: Effect: Harrow-Chosen
Effect: Harrow-Chosen.description:
This benefit is determined by alignment of the card you draw from the deck. The card can match both alignment components with yours (true match), match a single alignment component with yours (partial match), have no matching alignment components (unmatched), or have a diametrically opposed alignment to yours (misaligned).

True match: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to a saving throw of your choice (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will) for 1 minute.

Partial match: You gain resistance to one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) equal to your level for 1 minute.

Unmatched: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level. The temporary Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

Misaligned: You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to your Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: Effect: Harsh Judgement
Effect: Harsh Judgement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.37uOb0iaWCfTCvBZ]{Harsh Judgement}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

Effect: Heaven's Thunder.name: Effect: Heaven's Thunder
Effect: Heaven's Thunder.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qJdbK8vgIqeHU7bu]{Heaven's Thunder}

Until the end of your next turn, your unarmed attacks and any monk weapons you wield deal additional electricity and sonic damage; the amount of each damage type is equal to the number of damage dice for the weapon or unarmed attack. Any creature who successfully Grapples you or is successfully Grappled by you takes this damage immediately after the Grapple check is resolved (using the number of damage dice of your unarmed attack to determine the damage dealt).

If you also know the ki blast ki spell, you can choose to deal either electricity or sonic damage with the spell instead of force while this effect is active (ki blast loses the force trait and gains the electricity or sonic trait instead).

Effect: Helpful Tinkering.name: Effect: Helpful Tinkering
Effect: Helpful Tinkering.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qUSWPWxYF8gfhfHM]{Helpful Tinkering}

For 1 minute, the chosen ally's Strikes with the chosen weapon gain the same offensive boost your innovation has.

Effect: Heroes' Call.name: Effect: Heroes' Call
Effect: Heroes' Call.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: Effect: Heroic Recovery
Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed, and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.name: Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Boost
Effect: High-Speed Regeneration Speed Bo.description: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Hungry Goblin.name: Effect: Hungry Goblin
Effect: Hungry Goblin.description: You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Flurry} edge with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Outwit} edge with you.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the prey, and a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against your prey's attacks.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Precision} edge with you.

You have trained to aim for your prey's weak points. The first time you hit your hunted prey in a round, you also deal 1d8 additional precision damage. (Precision damage increases the damage you already deal, using the same type, but is ineffective against creatures that lack vital organs or weak points.)

At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.

3.label: First attack on hunted prey this round

Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).name: Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin)
Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.0b3TTeQGFOiy6ykz]{Change Shape}.

In hybrid shape, you appear as a mix between your ancestry and your inherent animal. While in hybrid shape, you gain a jaws unarmed Strike resembling the features of your inherent animal (fangs for bats, beaks for eagles, mandibles for wasps, and so on). Your jaws deal 1d4 piercing damage, have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits, and are in the brawling weapon group.

Effect: Hydration.name: Effect: Hydration
Effect: Hydration.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.vt67b8uoNEbskcBv]{Hydration} if you spend 24 hours outside of water.

Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.name: Effect: Imperial Blood Magic
Effect: Imperial Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ZEtJJ5UOlV5oTWWp]{Bloodline: Imperial}

A surge of ancestral memories grants you or one target a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Improved Poison Weapon
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{Improved Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Indomitable Spirit.name: Effect: Indomitable Spirit
Effect: Indomitable Spirit.description: You get a +4 circumstance bonus to AC and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. The additional action can be used to Strike or Stride.

Effect: Inspired Stratagem.name: Effect: Inspired Stratagem
Effect: Inspired Stratagem.description: You roll the triggering check twice and take the better of the two results.

Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.name: Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance
Effect: Inspiring Marshal Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Effect: Inspiring Resilience.name: Effect: Inspiring Resilience
Effect: Inspiring Resilience.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to their Will save against the triggering effect, or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect originated from an undead.

Effect: Invigorating Breath.name: Effect: Invigorating Breath
Effect: Invigorating Breath.description: You gain 20 temporary Hit Points. At 15th level, you instead gain 30 temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Juvenile Flight.name: Effect: Juvenile Flight
Effect: Juvenile Flight.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu]{Fledgling Flight}, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.name: Effect: Kindle Inner Flames
Effect: Kindle Inner Flames.description: The creature gains a status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.

Effect: Kneecap.name: Effect: Kneecap
Effect: Kneecap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1muxLx8Vacn2SLHc]{Kneecap}

The target takes a status penalty to its Speed.

Effect: Known Weakness.name: Effect: Known Weakness
Effect: Known Weakness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8]{Known Weaknesses}.

Your ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject of known weakness, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Warden
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VU7aZC7L08Mk1GVA]{Esoteric Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.K3QkcNWY8qpNEJrk]{Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uv235v6hXCITAFej]{Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lDfOzhKJoTCkLPtn]{Shining Oath (Liberator)}

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Life-Giving Magic.name: Effect: Life-Giving Magic
Effect: Life-Giving Magic.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Living Fortification.name: Effect: Living Fortification
Effect: Living Fortification.description: You position your weapon defensively, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.name: Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trait)
Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.description: You position your weapon defensively, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Living for the Applause.name: Effect: Living for the Applause
Effect: Living for the Applause.description: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Lock On.name: Effect: Lock On
Effect: Lock On.description: The construct gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against the designated enemy until the end of the turn. If you use 2 actions for the Command, the bonus is instead a +3 circumstance bonus, or a +4 circumstance bonus if you're legendary in Crafting.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-rank spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-rank spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**

Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: Effect: Maiden's Mending
Effect: Maiden's Mending.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Marshal's Aura.name: Effect: Marshal's Aura
Effect: Marshal's Aura.description:
Granted by being inside a Marshal's Aura.

Your aura has the emotion, mental, and visual traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{Masterful Hunter (Outwit)} with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.

3.label: Vs. attacks from hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

7.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

8.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

9.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

10.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

11.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

12.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{Masterful Hunter (Precision)} with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1d8 precision damage.

At 19th level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2d8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1d8 precision damage.

3.label: Second attack on hunted prey this round

5.label: Third attack on hunted prey this round

Effect: Metallic Skin.name: Effect: Metallic Skin
Effect: Metallic Skin.description: You fortify your natural resistances with elemental metal, covering your skin with thick metal. You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and resistance 10 to physical damage (except adamantine), but you take a –10-foot penalty to Speed. If you take fire damage while this ability is active, until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage with all your unarmed melee Strikes.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CkK7WwaWnrLXK9sW]{Methodical Debilitations}

The target doesn't gain a circumstance bonus to AC from Raising a Shield, lesser cover, or standard cover; it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC only from greater cover or Taking Cover.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanking)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.description: The target is unable to flank or provide flanking.

Effect: Monarch Wings.name: Effect: Monarch Wings
Effect: Monarch Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IzNyByUBNH94MDOr]{Fey Ascension}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Monster Hunter
Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Monster Warden.name: Effect: Monster Warden
Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs
Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.name: Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hit)
Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.description: Marks a target that critically hit you.

Effect: Mountain Stronghold.name: Effect: Mountain Stronghold
Effect: Mountain Stronghold.description: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: Effect: Mutate Weapon
Effect: Mutate Weapon.description: Select one unarmed attack you gained with Living Weapon. The damage die for that attack increases by one step until the end of your turn. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet until the end of your turn or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack until the end of your turn.

Effect: Nanite Surge.name: Effect: Nanite Surge
Effect: Nanite Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

Your circuitry glows, lighting a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] with dim light for 1 round.

Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).name: Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus)
Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering skill check.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.5Wxjghw7lHuCxjZz]{Bloodline: Nymph}

Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, either granting you a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 1 round or imposing a -1 status penalty on one target's Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, imposing a -1 status bonus to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Offensive Boost.name: Effect: Offensive Boost
Effect: Offensive Boost.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.F8oXHnu9iNTcpXbJ]{Offensive Boost}

Your improvements make any Strikes that rely on your innovation deal an additional 1d6 damage, with a type determined by the boost you choose. If your innovation is armor, the boost applies to your melee Strikes with one weapon you choose during daily preparations; if your innovation is a construct, the boost applies to your construct companion's Strikes.

Effect: Orchard's Endurance.name: Effect: Orchard's Endurance
Effect: Orchard's Endurance.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage. In addition, you roll flat checks to recover from persistent damage twice and take the higher result; this is a fortune effect.

Effect: Overdrive.name: Effect: Overdrive
Effect: Overdrive.description: Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overdrive (Success).name: Effect: Overdrive (Success)
Effect: Overdrive (Success).description: Your gizmos go into overdrive, adding power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overdrive Ally.name: Effect: Overdrive Ally
Effect: Overdrive Ally.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NBvhmNqneeok7ZOr]{Overdrive Ally}

Until the end of their next turn, that ally's Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier, or your full Intelligence modifier if you were in critical overdrive.

Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.name: Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive)
Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U0XX0Mm2MbZcuNK2]{Shared Overdrive}

The first time you use Overdrive Ally during a given Overdrive, the effect lasts for the remainder of the duration of your Overdrive, instead of just until the end of the target's next turn.

Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Effect: Overwatch Field
Effect: Overwatch Field.description: Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

Effect: Panache.name: Effect: Panache
Effect: Panache.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.LzYi0OuOoypNb6jd]{Panache}

While you have panache, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speeds and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to Tumble Through or to take any actions that give you panache due to your style.

Effect: Perfect Resistance.name: Effect: Perfect Resistance
Effect: Perfect Resistance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QN55ToyJIjxgPmhs]{Perfect Resistance}

After using a Student of Perfection ki spell, the resistance increases to be equal to your level for 1 round.

Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.name: Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic
Effect: Phoenix Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.TWR1wbPJuCLnGdFZ]{Bloodline: Phoenix}

Choose to have either you or a target of the spell gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank for 1 round.

Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.name: Effect: Pistolero's Challenge
Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yOyMlFGAgLfRas8m]{Pistolero's Challenge}

Both you and the opponent gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with Strikes made against each other. If you're a master in the skill you used for the check, the status bonus to damage rolls increases to +3, and if you're legendary, it increases to +4.

Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs
Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Poison Weapon
Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.name: Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon
Effect: Prayer-Touched Weapon.description: The chosen weapon deals an extra 1d6 vitality damage.

Effect: Precious Arrow.name: Effect: Precious Arrow
Effect: Precious Arrow.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MlxfNv98LZKfYl64]{Precious Arrow}

Choose cold iron or silver; if you shoot the arrow before the end of your turn, it counts as that material. At 14th level, add adamantine to the list of materials you can choose from.

Effect: Precise Debilitations.name: Effect: Precise Debilitations
Effect: Precise Debilitations.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wvJBIzgS298ZRp6w]{Precise Debilitations}

The target takes an additional 2d6 precision damage from your attacks.

Effect: Prevailing Position.name: Effect: Prevailing Position
Effect: Prevailing Position.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Primal Aegis.name: Effect: Primal Aegis
Effect: Primal Aegis.description: You gain resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, vitality, and void damage.

Effect: Propulsive Leap.name: Effect: Propulsive Leap
Effect: Propulsive Leap.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.name: Effect: Protective Spirit Mask
Effect: Protective Spirit Mask.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of the caster's next turn.

Granted By:@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nn7DiYYWinsSYrZy]{Protective Spirit Mask}

Effect: Psi Strikes.name: Effect: Psi Strikes
Effect: Psi Strikes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uisI6b7Ua5zSHDwj]{Psi Strikes}

The attack deals an extra 1d6 force damage.

Effect: Psychic Rapport.name: Effect: Psychic Rapport
Effect: Psychic Rapport.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]{Psychic Rapport}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}

Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PpzH9tJULk5ksX9w]{Bloodline: Psychopomp}

The border between life and death becomes blurred to you. You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Purifying Breeze.name: Effect: Purifying Breeze
Effect: Purifying Breeze.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

Effect: Push Back the Dead!.name: Effect: Push Back the Dead!
Effect: Push Back the Dead!.description: The creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against effects originating from undead.

Effect: Rage.name: Effect: Rage
Effect: Rage.description:
Requirements You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} or raging

You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.
  • You can't use actions with the concentrate trait unless they also have the rage trait. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} while raging.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoint based on level and con mod
  • Enables rage property for rage damage
  • Sets token effect

Effect: Raise Menhir.name: Effect: Raise Menhir
Effect: Raise Menhir.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BuVIM4cV7qhVZ2WF]{Raise Menhir}

Choose arcane, divine, or occult; all creatures within 15 feet of the monument gain a +2 status bonus to their saving throws against effects with that trait.

Effect: Raise Symbol.name: Effect: Raise Symbol
Effect: Raise Symbol.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.koER7gKf6CnW5O0s]{Raise Symbol}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws until the start of your next turn. While it's raised, if you roll a success at a saving throw against a vitality or void effect, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Rallying Charge.name: Effect: Rallying Charge
Effect: Rallying Charge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.df4cBV3qZn3qNUmP]{Rallying Charge}

You gain temporary hit points equal to the Charisma modifier of the creature that used Rallying Charge.

Effect: Rampaging Form.name: Effect: Rampaging Form
Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[cold]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Effect: Read Shibboleths
Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them.

Effect: Reanimator Dedication.name: Effect: Reanimator Dedication
Effect: Reanimator Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication}

The undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Summon Undead}.

Effect: Recall Under Pressure.name: Effect: Recall Under Pressure
Effect: Recall Under Pressure.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws for the remainder of the combat encounter as your morale soars or a +2 status bonus if the card you drew was from the suit of Books.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Barbarian).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.EWeso1zDkCLGlnsW]{Reckless Abandon (Barbarian)}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, a -2 penalty to AC, and a -1 penalty to saves. These bonuses and penalties last until your Rage ends or until you are above half Hit Points, whichever comes first.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description: For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.

Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Effect: Reflexive Shield
Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield} when you raise a shield that gives a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Renewed Vigor.name: Effect: Renewed Vigor
Effect: Renewed Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level plus your Constitution modifier.

Effect: Replenishment of War.name: Effect: Replenishment of War
Effect: Replenishment of War.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Effect: Resounding Bravery
Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's ability.

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).name: Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear)
Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's fear effect.

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Resounding Finale.name: Effect: Resounding Finale
Effect: Resounding Finale.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lhSqWHXK1JShUabF]{Resounding Finale}

All allies that had been benefiting from the spell's effects gain sonic resistance against the triggering damage.

Effect: Restorative Strike.name: Effect: Restorative Strike
Effect: Restorative Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xUlRLkWnfZ7reej6]{Restorative Strike}

If you make this Strike with your deity's favored weapon, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll.

Effect: Root Magic.name: Effect: Root Magic
Effect: Root Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.22P7IFyhrF7Fbw8B]{Root Magic}

The first time that day the ally attempts a saving throw against a spell or haunt, they gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the roll. This bonus increases to +2 if you're an expert in Occultism or +3 if you're legendary.

Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Safeguard Soul.name: Effect: Safeguard Soul
Effect: Safeguard Soul.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death effects, possession effects, and effects that attempt to manipulate or steal your soul.

Effect: Sanctify Armament.name: Effect: Sanctify Armament
Effect: Sanctify Armament.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}

The weapon gains your holy or unholy trait. It also deals an additional 2d6 spirit damage to creatures of the opposed trait.

Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: Effect: Saoc Astrology
Effect: Saoc Astrology.description: This effect grants you the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.

Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Effect: Scout's Warning
Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.

Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.name: Effect: Sea Glass Guardians
Effect: Sea Glass Guardians.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

Effect: Seedpod.name: Effect: Seedpod
Effect: Seedpod.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWGa6cFSVrASTEfd]{Seedpod}

On a critical hit, a seedpod bursts, issuing forth a tangle of vegetation that imposes a -10-foot circumstance penalty on the target's Speed for 1 round.

Effect: Selfish Shield.name: Effect: Selfish Shield
Effect: Selfish Shield.description: You gain resistance against the triggering damage equal to 2 + half your level, regardless of damage type.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.uoQOm41BVdSo6pAS]{Bloodline: Shadow}

Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, either granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth or imposing a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth)
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).description: Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth for 1 round.

Effect: Share Rage.name: Effect: Share Rage
Effect: Share Rage.description:
You tap into your inner fury and begin raging. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level plus your Constitution modifier. This frenzy lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies you can perceive, or until you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, whichever comes first. You can't voluntarily stop raging. While you are raging:

  • You deal 2 additional damage with melee weapons and unarmed attacks. This additional damage is halved if your weapon or unarmed attack is agile.
  • You take a -1 penalty to AC.

After you stop raging, you lose any remaining temporary Hit Points from Rage, and you can't Rage again for 1 minute.

Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: Effect: Shared Avoidance
Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Shared Avoidance}

Allies within 20 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.

Effect: Shared Clarity.name: Effect: Shared Clarity
Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}

Allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Shed Tail.name: Effect: Shed Tail
Effect: Shed Tail.description: You take a -2 circumstance penalty on checks to Balance.

Effect: Shield Ally.name: Effect: Shield Ally
Effect: Shield Ally.description: The hardness of your equipped shield increases by 2.

Effect: Shield of Faith.name: Effect: Shield of Faith
Effect: Shield of Faith.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.w3qyriA1YnzXaas3]{Shield of Faith}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your AC.

Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide vital advice to sharpen your newer colleagues' skills. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to skill checks to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's skill check modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Smite Evil.name: Effect: Smite Evil
Effect: Smite Evil.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite Evil}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes with the weapon your blade ally inhabits against that foe deal an extra 4 spirit damage, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the foe attacks one of your allies, the duration extends to the end of that foe's next turn. If the foe continues to attack your allies each turn, the duration continues to extend.

0.label: Target is subject of your Smite Evil

Effect: Smite Good.name: Effect: Smite Good
Effect: Smite Good.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.T5xFirAE8VLL5Lbu]{Smite Good}.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 spirit damage if the target is holy, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.

0.label: Target is subject of your Smite Good

Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.name: Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication
Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication}.

Whenever you or your spotter successfully Strikes a target, the other member of your duo gains a +1 circumstance bonus per weapon damage die on the damage roll of their next Strike made against that target before the end of their next turn.

Effect: Soaring Flight.name: Effect: Soaring Flight
Effect: Soaring Flight.description: To be a tengu is to be unburdened by the concerns of the world below. You grow a pair of magical wings or expand your existing ones. For 5 minutes, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Effect: Spark Fist.name: Effect: Spark Fist
Effect: Spark Fist.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BL2nLeClO30QoQGs]{Spark Fist}

Your fist loses the nonlethal trait and deals additional fire damage on a successful Strike.

Effect: Spell Parry.name: Effect: Spell Parry
Effect: Spell Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.X9AkydrMdFwg7qIn]{Spell Parry}

You raise your guard, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and to saving throws against spells that target you.

Effect: Spell Protection Array.name: Effect: Spell Protection Array
Effect: Spell Protection Array.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3CPKbiweBRzXAJA9]{Spell Protection Array}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magic.

Effect: Spin Tale.name: Effect: Spin Tale
Effect: Spin Tale.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saving throws against the villain until the start of your next turn.

2.label: Target is villain of Folklorist's Spun Tale

Effect: Spiral Sworn.name: Effect: Spiral Sworn
Effect: Spiral Sworn.description: For 3 rounds, your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the rank of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.

Effect: Spirit Guide Form.name: Effect: Spirit Guide Form
Effect: Spirit Guide Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WKRSBu7H9miAwUaR]{Spirit Guide Form}

You fuse with your spirit guide, becoming a hybrid being with enhanced physical and spiritual power. This effect lasts 1 minute; you can end it early as a free action. During this time, you can't use any other actions granted by this archetype. You gain the following statistics and abilities, regardless of your type of spirit guide.

  • You become incorporeal.
  • You gain resistance 10 to all damage (except force, ghost touch, or vitality; double resistance vs. non-magical).
  • Darkvision.
  • An unarmed melee attack of the same type as your spirit guide (either claws or jaws), which is the only attack you can Strike with. You're trained with this attack. Your attack modifier is +29 or your normal unarmed attack modifier, whichever is higher. You use the listed statistics for the unarmed attack type:
    • Claws (agile, backstabber, finesse) 1, Damage 3d6+5 slashing plus 1d6 force;
    • Jaws (forceful) 1, Damage 3d10+5 piercing plus 1d6 force.

Effect: Starlight Armor.name: Effect: Starlight Armor
Effect: Starlight Armor.description:
The armor grants you resistance 7 to piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage. The armor also sheds bright light for 20 feet (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

When you reach 17th level, the resistance increases to 10.

Effect: Stone Body.name: Effect: Stone Body
Effect: Stone Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgg9eNF6MsJPMjyH]{Stone Body}

You gain resistance 10 to all damage.

Effect: Stoney Deflection.name: Effect: Stoney Deflection
Effect: Stoney Deflection.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped

Effect: Strain Mind.name: Effect: Strain Mind
Effect: Strain Mind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.u8YnTCS2EGoJl90W]{Strain Mind}

You add an amp that costs 1 Focus Point to the spell. Instead of paying the normal Focus Point cost, you lose Hit Points equal to four times the spell rank of the amped psi cantrip as you bleed from your nose or suffer some other visible sign of strain.

Effect: Strained Metabolism.name: Effect: Strained Metabolism
Effect: Strained Metabolism.description:
Your body's overclocked physiology requires larger-than-usual amounts of nourishment, leaving you weakened when it kicks in mid-combat.

Mild Backlash Your metabolism immediately burns through your body's energy stores, making you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until you take a bite of food (which usually requires 2 Interact actions: one to retrieve the food and another to consume it).

Moderate Backlash Ravenous hunger wracks your body. You are enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} until you can eat a full meal, which requires at least 10 minutes.

Severe Backlash The strain on your body is truly incapacitating. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} as nausea wracks you, and you are also enfeebled 1 and clumsy 1 until you can eat a full meal (which requires you to no longer be sickened). You are fatigued until you can get a full night's rest.

0.label: Striking Retribution (vs. alghollthu and their servants) if alghollthu enchants ally

Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.name: Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes
Effect: Supercharge Prosthetic Eyes.description: You gain darkvision and low-light vision, and you gain a +1 status bonus to visual Perception checks.

Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.name: Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flanking)
Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.description: The target can't flank or contribute to allies' flanking.

Effect: Tail Toxin.name: Effect: Tail Toxin
Effect: Tail Toxin.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ev8OHpBO3xq3Zt08]{Tail Toxin}

You apply your tail's venom to a piercing or slashing weapon. If your next Strike with that weapon before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, you deal persistent poison damage equal to your level to the target.

Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.name: Effect: Thoughtform Summoning
Effect: Thoughtform Summoning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pqVG9mRKcXg5Rsjc]{Thoughtform Summoning}

Whenever you summon a creature, you can choose to instead create a psychic construct of that creature. This grants it resistance to physical damage equal to half its level and weakness 5 to force and mental damage.

Effect: Tidal Shield.name: Effect: Tidal Shield
Effect: Tidal Shield.description: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. You can Sustain the effect to a maximum duration of 5 rounds.

Effect: Tiller's Drive.name: Effect: Tiller's Drive
Effect: Tiller's Drive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

Effect: Topple Giants.name: Effect: Topple Giants
Effect: Topple Giants.description: When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.

Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.name: Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity
Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Treat Wounds for the duration.

Effect: Twin Parry.name: Effect: Twin Parry
Effect: Twin Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if neither weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).name: Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait)
Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if either weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Undead Blood Magic.name: Effect: Undead Blood Magic
Effect: Undead Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.7WBZ2kkhZ7JorWu2]{Bloodline: Undead}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank for 1 round.

Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs
Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

Effect: Undying Conviction.name: Effect: Undying Conviction
Effect: Undying Conviction.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{Undying Conviction}

Undead creatures gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws to resist vitality damage and to Will saving throws to resist effects that would make them controlled.

Effect: Undying Ferocity.name: Effect: Undying Ferocity
Effect: Undying Ferocity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZOycr00XDVTKuXa]{Undying Ferocity}

When you use Orc Ferocity, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Unleash Psyche.name: Effect: Unleash Psyche
Effect: Unleash Psyche.description: When you cast a damaging spell, you gain a status bonus to its damage equal to double the spell's rank. This applies only to spells that don't have a duration and that you cast using psychic spellcasting.

Effect: Ursine Avenger Form.name: Effect: Ursine Avenger Form
Effect: Ursine Avenger Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zV4vzcl7eoVewz5p]{Ursine Avenger Form}

You gain a jaws unarmed attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage and a claws unarmed attack that deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the agile trait.

Effect: Vicious Debilitations.name: Effect: Vicious Debilitations
Effect: Vicious Debilitations.description: The target gains weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Effect: Victorious Vigor.name: Effect: Victorious Vigor
Effect: Victorious Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.name: Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths
Effect: Walking the Cardinal Paths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.Item.GpT5RXUwhINODqkJ]{(Affinity Ablaze) Arms of Balance: Walking the Cardinal Paths}

One of your weapons or your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 2d6 fire, cold, acid, or electricity damage. The Strikes gain the appropriate energy trait as well.

Effect: Watch Your Back.name: Effect: Watch Your Back
Effect: Watch Your Back.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZCyJhsaugHB6mZW]{Watch Your Back}

The target gains a +2 status bonus to Perception checks against you, but it takes a –2 status penalty to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: Watchful Gaze.name: Effect: Watchful Gaze
Effect: Watchful Gaze.description: You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{All-Around Vision} until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

Effect: Weapon Infusion.name: Effect: Weapon Infusion
Effect: Weapon Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gvx8Mdg5mxUtTD5g]{Weapon Infusion}.

If your next action is an Elemental Blast, choose a weapon shape for it to take. You can choose to change the blast's damage type to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing-whichever suits the weapon shape-and you can choose other alterations depending on whether you make a melee or ranged blast.

  • Melee Add one of the following traits of your choice: agile, backswing, forceful, reach, sweep.
  • Ranged Choose one of three options: range increment 100 feet and the volley 30 feet trait, range increment 50 feet and the propulsive trait, or range increment 20 feet and the thrown trait.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical Success)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Wings of Air.name: Effect: Wings of Air
Effect: Wings of Air.description: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Wish for Luck.name: Effect: Wish for Luck
Effect: Wish for Luck.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.N6U02s9qJKQIvmQd]{Wish for Luck}

Roll the attack roll, saving throw, or skill check twice and take the higher result.

Effect: Witch's Charge.name: Effect: Witch's Charge
Effect: Witch's Charge.description: Granted when you designate someone as your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.52QyoGaysrfBOy5H]{Witch's Charge}.

Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.name: Effect: Wood Impulse Junction
Effect: Wood Impulse Junction.description: You gain temporary hit points equal to your level.

Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you help your less experienced colleagues recognize danger and withstand danger. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to Perception checks and Initiative rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Perception modifier by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Worm Form.name: Effect: Worm Form
Effect: Worm Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jynhIXH1zEavQA7v]{Worm Form}

You take on the form of a purple worm or transform into a humanoid-worm hybrid, retaining your own head but with a worm's body, transforming into a Huge battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the ability is lost. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss the form.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 40 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +25, and you use the listed damage. Melee attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +30, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of monster you choose:

  • Purple Worm Speed 40 feet, burrow 30 feet, swim 20 feet
    • Melee 1 jaws (deadly 2d10, reach 15 feet), Damage 3d10+15 piercing
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, poison, reach 15 feet), Damage 2d12+15 piercing plus 2d6 persistent poison
    • Melee 1 body (reach 15 feet) Damage 1d10+13 bludgeoning
  • Hybrid Speed 40 feet
    • Melee 1 stinger (agile, poison, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d12+15 piercing plus 1d6 persistent poison
    • Melee 1 body (reach 10 feet), Damage 1d10+13 bludgeoning
    • Hybrid Caster You retain the ability to speak, and can cast spells as long as they don't have somatic or material components.

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic.name: Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.dKTb959aCQIzSIXj]{Bloodline: Wyrmblessed}

Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round, or a target takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.name: Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status Penalty - Target)
Effect: Wyrmblessed Blood Magic (Status.description: Draconic might carries in your voice. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: You're an Embarrassment.name: Effect: You're an Embarrassment
Effect: You're an Embarrassment.description: You reroll the triggering Will saving throw with a +1 circumstance bonus.

Stance: Air Shroud.name: Stance: Air Shroud
Stance: Air Shroud.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QV4NCyZQBCABykS1]{Air Shroud}

Turbulent air suffuses your kinetic aura. This doesn't displace other matter but provides air for creatures in your kinetic aura that need air to breathe. Attacks with ranged weapons take a -1 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls if their paths pass through your kinetic aura. Air in your kinetic aura is difficult terrain for flying creatures other than yourself.

Stance: Arcane Cascade.name: Stance: Arcane Cascade
Stance: Arcane Cascade.description:
Requirements You used your most recent action this turn to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} or make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{Spellstrike}. You need to meet this requirement only to enter the stance, not to remain in it.

You divert a portion of the spell's magical power and keep it cycling through your body and weapon using specialized forms, breathing, or footwork. While you're in the stance, your melee Strikes deal 1 extra force damage. This damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization and 3 if you have greater weapon specialization. Any Strike that benefits from this damage gains the arcane trait, making it magical.

If your most recent spell before entering the stance was one that can deal damage, the damage from the stance is instead the same type that spell could deal (or one type of your choice if the spell could deal multiple types of damage).

Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle.name: Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle
Stance: Assume Earth's Mantle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vV0nW9OIJ0VdeVjy]{Assume Earth's Mantle}

Enormous pieces of rock cluster around your body. You can Dismiss this impulse.

  • You become Large if you were smaller. This increases your reach by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny).
  • You gain a climb Speed equal to your land Speed, but you can use it only to climb surfaces of earthen matter.
  • The armor grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude saves and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DCs against attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} you, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} you, or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
  • If your Strength is below +4, this armor raises your Strength to +4. If your Strength is +4 or higher, this armor grants you a +1 item bonus to your Strength.
  • If you have the Armor in Earth impulse, you can add its effects to Assume Earth's Mantle.

Stance: Buckler Dance.name: Stance: Buckler Dance
Stance: Buckler Dance.description:
Granted by: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tDWc2LQNl0Op1Auq]{Buckler Dance}

Requirements You are wielding a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1k3AsSW7lpU0kEpY]{Buckler}.

You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack. While you are in this stance, you constantly have your buckler raised as if you'd used @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield}, as long as you meet that action's requirements.

Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.name: Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance
Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance}

Requirements You're unarmored and wielding a simple firearm, bayonet, or reinforced stock

Effect You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of simple firearms. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using bayonets, reinforced stocks, and simple firearms. You can use Flurry of Blows with these weapons. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with bayonets and reinforced stocks, so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike. You can also use them with simple firearms when attacking within half the first range increment.

Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.name: Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance
Stance: Clinging Shadows Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uJXs4M6IeixfPBLc]{Clinging Shadows Stance}

You adopt the stance of clinging shadows. You can make shadow grasp Strikes. These deal 1d4 void damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, grapple, reach, and unarmed traits.

While in the clinging shadows stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, and to the DC for creatures to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from you.

Stance: Cobra Stance.name: Stance: Cobra Stance
Stance: Cobra Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance}

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).name: Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)
Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{Cobra Envenom}, which increases the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC to +2.

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Stance: Crane Stance.name: Stance: Crane Stance
Stance: Crane Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bf7NCeKqDClaqhTR]{Crane Stance}

You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane's wings and using flowing, defensive motions. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC, but the only Strikes you can make are crane wing attacks. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Crane Stance, reduce the DC for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{High Jump} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} by 5, and when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, you can move an additional 5 feet horizontally or 2 feet vertically.

2.text: Reduce the DC for High Jump and Long Jump by 5, and when you Leap, you can move an additional 5 feet horizontally or 2 feet vertically.

Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury.name: Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury
Stance: Crowned in Tempest's Fury.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8iHpUB0bYaHh86Kk]{Crowned in Tempest's Fury}

You become one with a devastating thunderstorm from the Plane of Air, placing a crown of lightning upon your brow. Sparks flash in your eyes, and lightning strikes constantly in the air around you as howling winds lift you from the ground.

  • Any creature that enters your kinetic aura or ends its turn there takes @Damage[2d12[electricity]] damage.
  • If you don't have a fly Speed, you gain a 20-foot fly Speed. If you have the Cyclonic Ascent impulse, you instead gain that fly Speed and the extra benefits.
  • You gain a +10-foot status bonus to all your Speeds.
  • Your air Elemental Blasts deal an additional @Damage[1d12[electricity]] damage.

Stance: Desert Wind.name: Stance: Desert Wind
Stance: Desert Wind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ti6rPcSBsCuyEHqy]{Desert Wind}

A vortex of sand and dust surrounds you. Each creature inside your kinetic aura (including you) is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from any creature outside your kinetic aura, and creatures outside the aura are concealed from creatures inside the aura other than you. Your air impulses carry sands that cut at great speed.
